name: Kukirin Patinete Eléctrico Adultos Todoterreno,Patin Electrico,Scooter Electrico Potente Plegable/Autonomía de 70-75 km/Ruedas de 10"/Carga máxima 120kg/IP54/Doble Frenos de Disco,G2 MAX
description: Lightweight electric scooter for adults with brushless motor 1200W 48V peak power, rated power 1000W, capable of climbing slopes with a high degree of inclination. | Lithium battery with capacity of 21,000 mAh, achieves a range of 70-75 km. | Durable and stable 10" Tubeless Dual Grip pneumatic wheels ready to ride on all types of terrain and disc brakes; display on the handlebar with battery information, km rides, odometer, gear selector and scooter configuration. | LED lights: high brightness front spotlight, LED on the base, selectable indicator from the handlebars and rear brake light; front and rear suspension with double dampers provide optimal absorption of bumps and bumps in the ground. | Meets all the requirements of the new Spanish road regulations.
